A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Disappointment might be the best word to describe The Last Jedi. It has not of the heart or fun of The Force Awakens\, or the original trilogy and Rogue One for that matter. 

The story is thin\, the trip to the casino planet is a little to prequel like for my taste and and the use of Luke Skywalker (without spoilers) is dumb and wasted\, especially after such a build up to his appearance in The Force Awakens.

The best part of the movie is the opening sequence and there is a fight scene later that works very well\, but the rest of the movie is just kind of blah.
